about.title: Software Engineering Undergraduate at UNIMAS | Software Development | Web Development | Growth Mindset
about.summary: I am a Software Engineering student from UNIMAS with experience in software development, project management, and team collaboration. A responsible person who goes all out to meet or exceed expectations. A fast learner seeking to gain more real life work experience. A team player who works well with people from different cultures. An efficient time manager, always making sure that all tasks are completed on time. Last but not least, I'm a firm believer in self-taught.
